explanation: The original code multiplied by T_dp[i+1][-1], which is the cumulative probability that T has reached the goal by time i+1. The correct term is the probability that T reaches the goal for the first time at time i+1, i.e. T_dp[i+1][N] - T_dp[i][N]. I fixed the line to use that difference and applied modulo reductions to avoid negative values under mod.
